name: EradiKate Daily Cleanser
about: What it is:A daily foaming acne face wash, formulated with three percent sulfur, that strongly cleanses without irritation or over-drying..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Sulfur: Exfoliates, unclogs pores, and targets breakouts..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Kate Somervilleu2019s clinic-perfected cleanser is uniquely formulated to cleanse acne-prone skin while working to address blemishes, unclog pores, balance oily skin, and minimize the appearance of pores. See visibly clearer skin with continued use.
ingredients: -Sulfur: Exfoliates, unclogs pores, and targets breakouts..-Honey and Rice Bran Extracts: Calm and soothe. .-Natural Oat Extract: Reduce, absorb, and balance sebum production...Water, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Coco-Glucoside, Acrylates Copolymer, Coconut Alcohol, Glycereth-18 Ethylhexanoate, Glycereth-18, Stearyl Alcohol, Honey Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Oligopeptide-10, Boswellia Serrata Extract, Behenyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Disodium Carboxyethyl Siliconate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use in the morning and evening. .-Apply a small amount to wet face..-Massage gently for 30 seconds..-Rinse..-Gently pat dry..-Follow with Kate Somervilleu2019s EradiKate Acne Treatment (sold separately) for maximum results..-Avoid contact with eye area..-Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two or three times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The 4oz tube has lasted me forever and is such a great staple in my routine! Iu2019ve found that it works best when used with a facial brush, such as a Clarisonic or Foreo; it really helps to get the sulfur and good ingredients into each little pore. My skin gets sensitive if I use it twice a day, so I went down to once a day and itu2019s perfect. I will be repurchasing when I run out. It seems to help my hormonal breakouts. Sulfur is never a good smell but itu2019s really mild and the benefits/results outweigh the fragrance of the product.

reviews.review_title: Breakout beware for sensitive skin girlies
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it so badly after Dr. Shereene Idriss recommended it on her Youtube channel for those who suffer from acne, which is me. However, I have somewhat sensitive skin, and from what I am reading online, the pH of some sulfur cleansers like this one can be too strong on the skin causing it to breakout or have a skin purge effect that is somewhat similar to retinol. If my skin is purging, it will be due to retinol, NOT a cleanser. I have never had a break out this badly since my teens or if I am using a new skincare product that does not agree with my skin type. Sadly, this cleanser from Kate Somerville is one of them, which is a shame because I love the foaming aspect of it while it feels like a traditional clay mask that you'd apply to your face 2-3 times a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fyi i was not paid for this review. I bought this on sale after seeing hype for it on tik tok. I have sensitive oily to combination skin with moderate cystic acne along my jaw and neck, enlarged pores on my nose and cheeks, and sebaceous filaments on my nose. I have never used a product that so dramatically changed my skin. I did a patch test then washed my face with it one night. I was grateful I didnu2019t have a reaction to this product because itu2019s common for me to have a red face after trying something new (even with a patch test). It definitely has that sulfur smell which I donu2019t mind just make sure you rinse it well. I noticed after washing that my skin felt clean and smooth and I made sure to hydrate really well because i was worried about drying out. The next day I noticed my face did not get oily throughout the day at all! Usually by noon Iu2019ve become oily, especially on my nose and forehead. After one use I noticed that difference. Now after two weeks of using about every other day, I can say that my sebaceous filaments on my nose have greatly reduced, my skin looks clearer, and Iu2019m much less oily. I still have the hormonal cystic acne on my jaw and neck, but it seems smaller than usual so thatu2019s a plus. My recommendation is to hydrate well after washing with this product to prevent your skin from drying. Iu2019m so glad I gave this product a try and I think it will be worth it in the future to even buy it full price (Iu2019m usually an on-sale purchaser only). If you have sebaceous filaments and/ or oily skin I recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: This actually keeps my skin clear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I soooo wish I had before and after photos since using this product daily.  I suffer from hormonal acne, and patches of redness that looks like acne but there arenu2019t any raised bumps.  My pores have also become more noticeable as Iu2019ve aged (Iu2019m 36).  When I tell you Iu2019ve tried nearly every acne cleanser out there I mean I HAVE TRIED THEM ALL.  The only one that ever made a difference is the original Proactive cleanser but Iu2019ve stopped using products that contain parabens and it wasnu2019t working for me like it used to anyways.  Iu2019ve found that salycic acid cleansers donu2019t work for me and neither does benzoyl peroxide, although it used to.  I picked this up during Ultau2019s 21 days of beauty sale figuring I had nothing to lose and within a week my skin had completely cleared up for the first time in over a year.  I started reading about the benefits of sulfur for acne prone skin and wish Iu2019d had known about it so much sooner!  Iu2019ve been using this cleanser for over a month now and still get the occasional pimple around that time of the month but itu2019s a night and day difference from before.  I can actually leave the house without foundation and feel comfortable in my skin.  If youu2019ve tried salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide cleansers and they havenu2019t worked for you pleeeaaase give this a shot.  The only downside is that it has a very mild scent (to be expected with any product containing sulfur), but itu2019s not at all overbearing and dissipates once you wash it off.  But if youu2019re super sensitive to scents, maybe get it when itu2019s on sale or buy a mini first.  So happy I found a product that works for me!!!

This did awful things to me. I used it for a few weeks and very quickly began getting lots of pimples in places I don't normally break out. For a while, I kept thinking something else must have been causing the acne. After all, what could be harmful in this product? Sulfur is supposed to be great for acne. I didn't even mind that it had that sulfur scent. But it dawned on me after a few weeks that it might be this cleanser. I put it away, and sure enough, my skin began to clear up right away. This product seems to work for a lot of people, but it definitely did not work for me.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely never review any products, but felt almost obligated to by the success I have had with this product. I typically have true combo skin, bad blackheads, extremely sensitive and acne prone skin especially when over-exfoliated. After narrowing my acne down to a fungal acne caused by varying hormone levels, I searched high and low for sulfur containing products to accompany a topical anti fungal prescribed from my physician. This face wash is one of the few suggested for fungal acne, and the only one you need. My skin has not looked this good in over a year and a half (even with just the topical anti fungal ). You can definitely smell the sulfur, but my skin has never felt dried out or over exfoliated. Highly recommend a try if all other paths have been unsuccessful.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in my early 40u2019s, never had acne in my life. Now I have horrible cystic acne all over my chin and jawline that will not heal for weeks. Itu2019s so embarrassing and difficult to cover with makeup. Itu2019s not from a mask because I work from home all day, so it is likely hormonal or stress related. I got a sample of this and after one use everything began to calm down. Each time I used it, twice a day, my sores FINALLY began to heal more and more. No new whiteheads or pimples developed. I have sensitive dry skin and this did not dry out my face at all. It has a slight smell but Iu2019ll deal with it for what it has done for my face! I will be buying the full size when my sample tube runs out. So happy and relieved to have tried this product.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve spent forever trying to find a cleanser that helps with acne and oiliness and this is the only one that works for me. I rarely break out anymore but when I do, it goes away fast when I use this cleanser.

I will say tho that you don't have to use this everyday. This could be a treatment cleanser on alternate days with something more basic one normal days. I use this on makeup days to really get the skin clean, but normally I just use good old cetaphil. Especially good for the Aunt Red times...y'all know.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this wash to be too harsh on my hormonal acne.  As someone with PCOS acne, it is difficult to topically treat acne that is triggered from within.  This wash seems like it will work, but is too stripping for acne.  I used to think that the more dried out my skin was then there wouldn't be any bacteria alive.  But what I was really doing was throwing off my skin's moisture barrier and causing it to overproduce oil, which further inflamed my acne.  This wash is no exception. There are better hydrating cleansers that will not inflame or strip your skin.  I personally use the First aid Beauty pure skin cleanser, and the Youth to the People superfood cleanser and have had wonderful topical results.

reviews.review_text: I purchased this product months ago on a whim from a recommendation from a Sephora employee. This product tarnished my sterling silver necklace that I have had for over six years so I can only imagine what it is doing to peoples skin. When I reached out to let them know they basically told me it was user error and I should always remove jewelry before using products (which I have never done over the years of wearing that necklace everyday) and they were not willing to compensate me for my now dark graphite Tiffany&Co necklace. Besides their average customer service, this product is just that. Average. My skin has always been normal with the usual hormonal breakout but since using this product for the past months, my skin has been at its worst. Do not waste your money on this product.

My skin is clearer than ever and it worked within days. Also pairs well with The Ordinary niacinamide and Kielu2019s moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and this really helps with acne without irritating or drying out the skin. Yes sulfur has a distinct smell but it really isnu2019t bad or anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My dermatologist recommended a sulfur based cleanser for my rosacea. Sulfur is a great anti-inflammatory and reduces redness. The Kate Somerville was the only cleanser with sulfur that didn't have OTHER actives in it (like salicylic acid), seemed gentle enough for my sensitive skin, and wasn't just a regular soap bar which were wayyyy too drying.  This cleanser IS drying, but not unbearably so - I have dry skin and use this at night and definitely need moisturizer after, but it doesn't make me feel tight or stripped. And while I don't get acne much anymore I've noticed this dries up the few whiteheads I get around my period so that's a nice bonus.  Sulfur has definitely helped with reducing my rosacea, and this cleanser is the best non-rx, simple sulfur cleanser I've been able to get my hands on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Use it morning and night, itu2019s perfect for my acne prone sensitive skin. On my second tube and will buy again :)

reviews.review_text: An absolute must for me. Once I tried it I was hooked. Perfect for my somewhat sensitive and mixed combination skin. It doesnu2019t dry my face or cause breakouts. I havenu2019t found a product I like more than this cleanser

reviews.review_title: Good replacement for my old prescription
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use a prescription sulfur facewash and I was no longer able to get that the past couple years. I loved how sulfur smoothed out my skin and I wanted to achieve that again. I have problem areas on the sides of my nose where lots of dead skin builds up no matter how much I try to manually exfoliate each day, and pustules can easily form.  This stuff is really good, I only need a pea sized amount each night and rub it in when it's foamy for 30 sec as advised. It's great at stopping and preventing breakouts, and getting rid of that problematic dead skin. A couple weeks of usage and my face is nicely becoming smooth along with my neck. My nose area doesn't get as much pustules as before and is smoothing out too. It works as well as my old prescription. But please, YMMV. I would go back to my prescription if I could.  Unpopular opinion, but I love the smell of sulfur. This foam smells like floral sulfur, they were trying very hard to mask it. Eventually the real sulfur smell comes through and lingers. It might not be for you if you can't stand the smell.  I combine this with azelaic acid and centella products for even more benefits as I have lingering redness and PIH.  It's worth the expense, especially if you only use a small amount once a night this bottle can last several months. Plus, the light pink color is so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used so many facial cleansers and this one has typed all of them.

reviews.review_title: Best acne cleanser I have ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this product back in July when I found out I was pregnant with my first child! I have always liked using an acne/ oil control face wash in the AM but my current one contained salicylic acid which is not safe to use during pregnancy. I talked to my doctor about pregnancy safe alternatives and did lots of online research which led me to this product. Not only is it pregnancy safe but it is probably the most effective acne cleanser I have ever used! I have far fewer breakouts even with my hormones going crazy from pregnancy and it does wonders for keeping shine at bay in my t-zone while not over drying the rest of my face. I should mentioned I have combo skin and tend to have a very oily t-zone but normal-dry cheeks. I only use this is the AM followed by a vitamin c serum and moisturizer. It has a bit of a sulfur smell but hey what do you expect from a cleanser that has sulfur as an active ingredient? The smell doesnu2019t linger on your face but can linger on your device if you use one to wash your face. I use the FOREO Luna 3 and have to make sure I rinse all the cleanser out after each wash to keep the smell away. This is definitely a product I will continue to buy even after I can use salicylic acid again, it is just so good!

reviews.review_title: Great Pregnant-Safe Option for Hormonal Acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never written a review before but doing so now to pay it forward, since I have relied on reviews so much over the past few months.  I've battled awful, hormonal acne since going off the birth control pill and starting fertility treatments (IUI, IVF, etc) about a year ago. I used ALL the chemicals (salicylic, BP, etc.) and nothing really helped.   I got pregnant (yay!) but then the acne only got worse and more stubborn and spreading. I went to Sephora yesterday and asked specifically for something with SULFUR, because chemicals like Salicylic, etc. are not safe for baby and not allowed when pregnant.   So I bought this yesterday and have to say after after 2 uses I noticed immediate results - NO NEW BREAKOUTS this morning for the first time in months and the redness looking visibly calmer and lighter. I'm floored!   Some people mentioned smell being bad? I think it smells fine! For a Sulfur product, I was expecting a rotten egg smell but it was honestly fine. Also, I love the cream texture - if you don't use tons of water at first, it can kind of sit on your face a bit before you rinse it off, which I like.   Overall, I'm really impressed so far and optimistic.

reviews.review_text: The main active ingredient is sulfur and it reeks! It smells like perm chemicals. And even after you wash your face and put on all your other skincare products you still smell it. I don't care if it did help my skin. I can't continue to use this, it's disgusting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser Iu2019ve ever used! I was hesitant to spend $40 on a cleanser because Iu2019ve been using one for less than $10 for years, but I will never go back! Iu2019ve got dry checks and a very oily T zone. This doesnu2019t dry my face out at all and keeps my face from being oily. I used to breakout all the time and I havenu2019t had a break out since I bought this two months ago. For the first time in my life I got a compliment on how good the skin my face looks without makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been suffering from hormonal cystic acne for most of my twenties, and couldn't find anything to clear my face until now. I've been using this morning and night for a few weeks and my face has completely cleared up, and for the first time in forever I have no new breakouts popping up! I cannot remember the last time my skin felt this smooth. My friends and family have noticed the difference, and I feel more confident going out with a make-up free face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with this cleanser. It leaves my face clean and acne free. My pores are smaller and my skin feels fresh. It never makes it feel too tight or dry and really helps control my break outs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have gone to the dermatologist for almost a year and put on hundreds of dollars worth of medication for my acne (antibiotics, cremes, face washes, toners ect.) and this is the ONLY thing that cleared up my skin. From the time I got it, it took a week for me to see DRASTIC differences in my skin. My acne was less red and going away after the first use. I suggest putting this on a slightly damp face (only need a tiny amount like nickle sized) and leaving it on while you brush your teeth then rinse it off. The extra time on your face really makes a difference. Oddly enough, the other products by Kate did not help my acne at all so if you are struggling like I was, try this first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a little over a year and while it helps my face so much when I use it daily. (They say use twice per day but that was a little too drying for my skin type) recently I was annoyed with my chest acne and just being overly bumpy and a little pimpley I was frustrated so I was like it canu2019t really hurt right? And within a week my chest feels nearly clear!! The holy grail of acne sufferers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have had acne on my chin and cheeks for 5 months. After two failed prescriptions a Sephora consultant recommended this and I'm so glad she did this. This is the only product that I instantly noticed a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this for a few weeks now & the only con is that I did not try this sooner! I did not have any breakouts or blemishes really when I began using this so am unsure how quickly it clears, but haven't had a single breakout since I started using this. My period is due to arrive in several days which is when I normally have a breakout but thus far my skin has stayed clear. I feel like over time the redness in my skin has gone down and it's less oily than it was. I was concerned about the smell before I bought it due to the sulfur, but it's not overpowering and doesn't bother me. It's definitely drying & makes my skin feel tight so recommend moisturizing in evening and morning after washing your face with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and my breakouts *seem* mostly hormonal these days. I got this face wash to help get rid of my acne (the sales lady said it should help) and have been using it for a little over a month. I think it is working pretty well, I'm breaking out less than before. I just wished it helped more with blackheads as I am still having/developing those. Overall though I like it and think it's def worth trying for anyone who has problematic skin! Oh and I'm not even close to needing to repurchase so I'm guessing this tube is going to last like 6 months which makes the price okay by me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle cleanser that does seem to be helping my acne. Doesn't dry out my skin OR make it greasy halfway through the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my favorite acne treatment cleanser that I have tried, and I have tried a good amount having acne prone skin and all. It has really helped reduce the appearance of breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I was highly disappointed. It dried my skin badly and also had a horrible smell. I hate throwing away any beauty products but couldnu2019t continue to use it just to finish it, my skin was getting flaky with every use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I read the reviews, and thought this would change my skin. But I used it for 4 months and it did nothing to help clear my severe acne. I donu2019t recommend at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews for anything but this totally deserves a review, its honestly a life changer. Nothings ever really kept my face clear, yeah I still get minor break outs but thats just hormonal but when im not getting my period or anything my skin looks so good, it does dry my face out a little but I just slap some coconut oil on, and its the best combo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: honestly rly like this cleanser. really cant tell if its doing anything or not cuz im using so many other products   am on low dose accutane, but for whatever reason i love it more than other cleansers and plan to continue to use it. also i know its expensive but like i legit use a pea size a night or every other night i can tell its gonna last a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best things that has ever happened to my skin. This saved my skin from horrible break outs, congestion and discomfort. If you are highly sensitive to sulfur, however, you likely will not enjoy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t see overnight results with this product like many other reviewers here but I will say if you have stubborn texture/blackheads all over your jaw/cheek area like I do and no amount of aha/BHA will get rid of them- THIS is the solution to your problems. Just make sure you use it EVERYDAY. The only con is the price. But well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: not a fan of this product. it probably just want for my skin but it made my breakouts worse. definitely would not repurchase or recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've struggled for a really long time with finding a cleanser that helps with my acne prone skin but I can honestly say this cleanser has to be the best I've ever used. It faded the redness from my acne significantly after 3 uses, and many of my pimples have gone down or disappeared completely. It's also done a great job of shrinking my pores. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was only effective for about a month - but even then, it didnu2019t completely clear up my acne. Will pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is an okay product. It honestly did nothing for my breakouts which was disappointing since its pretty pricy! I ended up going back to my $5 sulfate face bar and it does a better job than this. A good upside is it did not dry my skin out even though I have dry skin. It foams up nicely as well and a little goes a long way so it'll definitely last a while. Just did nothing for my breakouts unfortunately. I even dedicated an entire month using this and nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I used to have cystic acne, and a lot of small bumps on my forehead. After a few weeks using this, I noticed a difference. My skin was clearing up so much. Now I only have the 3-4 small pimples usually. It is a very creamy wash, I use about a quarter size in morning, and then again at night. I follow with a moisturizer and the Kate Somerville sulfur spot treatment

reviews.review_title: One of my all time favorites!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start with that I have re-purchased this multiple times now. I have combination skin in the winter and normal to oily in the summer. i also have food intolerances as well, so i am very acne prone. Anything i have tried with sulfur always help my skin amazingly. This whole EradiKate line is superb for me and several of my clients. i use it 1-5 days a week depending on how my skin is behaving. This always helps my inflammation and helps my breakouts subside much quicker. I would Not recommend this for dry, super sensitive or extra flaky skin. I do feel a slight tingle and tightness sometimes after use. But thats it working it's magic in my pores. The key is balancing is with good moisture. definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly such a miracle product, helped with my teenage acne so much, even within three days there was a noticeable difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this and the spot treatment daily and noticed a HUGE improvement in my skin. I just ordered another of the daily cleanser since I have a bad habit of using too much. a little goes a long way. The spot treatement worked really well and then kinda stopped but I've been reading that over using it dries out the skin. so I've gone down to using it only every other day and my skin reacts much better to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cleanser. I have had hormonal acne that started about a year ago and my skin is too sensitive for benzoyl peroxide/ salicylic acid cleansers. The sulfur really diminishes my acne right away and is not too harsh. I tried a different, cheaper cleanser and immediately regretted it and came back to this one. Would recommend to anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this! I've only been using it for a week and it has already gotten rid of most of my acne and helped reduce some cystic acne. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, Love, Love this cleanser. It works great I used it twice a day every other day I rotate with Kate Somerville Exfoliate Cleanser. I love Kate Somerville products so much. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS STUFF IS AMAZING! reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is the new love of my life! It has saved my skin. It can be a bit drying, but I donu2019t even care. It also doubles as a mask and spot treatment and lasts forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser. I never write reviews, but I feel like I need to let others know how great this cleanser is. I have sensitive skin, which I have misdiagnosed as oily/combination skin for the longest time. This cleanser is super gentle on my skin and doesn't completely dry my face out. You also don't need a lot of it so the tube will last me at least a year. I use it every other day since my skin is fairly clear of pimples and my focus is my pores and blackheads. My skins is super soft and shiny afterwards and my blackheads are diminished and my pores are visibly smaller.

reviews.review_title: Pretty in pink, but not helpful
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kate Somerville's products are usually great. I do enjoy them a lot. Then this cleanser came along and changed that happy streak.  Not only did this not do a thing for my acne but it also gave me more texture and dullness for my skin. I don't want to touch this ever again. I'm glad it has worked for others and we all have different skin. I used it for a month and I had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had really bad acne and this stuff was like magic cleared me up within a week!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite face wash I have used!! My skin looks so much better just by this. Iu2019ve gone on to add a few more of the EradiKate line to my regimen and I have to say that I am in love with her products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had acne prone skin ,, i start using  this cleanser about a month ago with my Mia 2 & it did great job in helping clear my acne .. if you r looking some great product for clear your acne ,, u should definitely try this out ... luv this cleanser!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice but not too strong and does keep my skin mostly clear.

reviews.review_title: great but a bit too drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been working to control some of my acne, however I do find it drying, at least in the cold weather months. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This soap has saved my skin! Iu2019ve had acne scars in my face and started to get it bad on my shoulders. I started using this daily and my skin has cleared up quickly. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does help to calm your skin when its really irritated and broken out. BUT, I don't like to use it a lot because of the smell. If you have used sulfur products before you'd know the smell is quite offensive. And for some reason when I use this, in the shower or in the sink the smell always lingers. (I had to stop using it in the shower because my shower would smell of it and I would have to scrub every inch after) Which bothers me because I do like the product. If you can get over the smell I would recommend it. But because I literally cannot take getting a whiff of this every few seconds during the day, I would not purchase. I used my rewards points to get a decent size sample of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for my teenage son who was going through the u201cchangeu201d which showed all over his sweet face.  It was remarkable how his large pores on his nose diminished and the acne cleared up nearly in its entirety after a week of using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This brand was recommended to me after I explained how my acne was becoming more of an issue. Overall I've been breaking out (mostly on my chin area) for about 2 years now and over time has become worse. I regret trying this product, because not only do I still have acne but now I also have dry skin. I won't be using a face wash for acne again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a week, along with the EradiKate spot treatment, and I must say this is the only thing thatu2019s been able to clear my acne. Iu2019m 27, and get horrible breakouts along my jaw line and temples, and since Iu2019ve used this it has dried out my existing acne, and has prevented from major pimples coming through. Iu2019ve still gotten one or two, very minor pimples, but I am a long distance runner and I believe that just comes with the territory of the amount of sweat running induces. This product really takes the redness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This facial cleanser is one of the best I've ever used. I have combination skin ( in the winter) and oily skin in the summer, prone to blemishes due to hormonal causes. This certainly does keep my skin clear. I have also brought it during travels, and it worked for me very well. ( my skin tends to react to different environment a bit more, and also the sheets in the hotels) You only need a little bit at one time, and it actually does foam up nicely, which help to spread the cleanser all around face and give it a good cleanse. The smell is very minimal. One tube will last quite a while, so I will highly recommend this product for anyone trying to control their blemish prone skin from breaking out.

reviews.review_title: More Breakouts Using This Cleanser!!!!!! XXXX

reviews.review_title: Great for clearing skin and preventing breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019ve been struggling with acne for about 6 months. iu2019d been to the dermatologist multiple times and tried a variety of prescription strength topical creams and pills. however, none of them cleared my skin as well as this face wash. will definitely repurchase and continue using

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve dealt with acne problems since I started high school. I tried proactive, murad, and tons of OTC acne products and washes. Benzoyl peroxide and salicylic acid do nothing long term (or HARDLY short term) for my combination acne prone skin. I had to try this since the active ingredient is Sulfur, hearing that if the others donu2019t work for you that a wash with sulfur may. Well I have to say after a week or so of investing in this cleanser, my face not only looks healthier and brighter, itu2019s clearing up too! I will update if anything changes, but for now I am loving this product and hope it continues to do wonders for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using regularly for the last 3 months as part of a regular skin care routine and have definitely noticed an improvement. Recommended by both a Sephora associate and my sister.

reviews.review_title: I will buy this until I die

reviews.review_text: I had pesky and annoying acne in my forehead and cheeks. It wasn't the worst, but I hated it. It's a very thick cleanser and foams perfectly and leaves my skin feeling very clean. I still have blackheads and occasionally oily skin, but this helped everything else so much. I also recommend the foaming face mask from the Eradikate line.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing cleanser!! You only need a little bit has a great lather and smells just like the other products in this category. Doesnu2019t dry out your skin. Canu2019t go wrong with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buy this right now. You won't regret it. Why? As someone who has DRY ACNE PRONE skin, I LOVE IT! My wife has Oily Acne Prone skin, she loves it! But no, this stuff is awesome all the time, all year round! So if you have dry/combo/oily acne prone skin, BUY IT! I've already gone through four bottles!!! LOVE THIS!

reviews.review_title: great everyday cleanser for acne prone skin!!

reviews.review_text: This product dramatically reduced my texture and everyday little whiteheads that I get. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I donu2019t have oily skin so that may be the cause of it but I donu2019t recommend for people who are not oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I started with the ExfoliKate and liked that a lot, but I was still getting my usual occasional breakouts plus milia on my forehead that wouldn't go away, so I thought maybe I needed something tailored towards acne. I was a bit hesitant to try a new anti-acne ingredient in case it was too harsh on my skin, like the awful stuff I used to use back in middle school. This cleanser is nothing like that, though. It's gentle, mild, and doesn't dry me out (I'm already prone to dry skin). I use it once a day, at night, with my Foreo Luna. My breakouts have cleared up nicely, especially the stubborn milia -- they were completely gone in just a few days! This was worth it just for that. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this daily cleanser. I have combination skin prone to acne. This stuff takes its away and keep its away.

If you have acne and blemishes and congested skin, its probably better to invest in a good product with acids.

reviews.review_title: Works as well as in the description!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for cystic acne! My now husband was breaking out so bad before our wedding (I'll blame stress) and this product in combination with the acne spot treatment worked wonders! Need to use with a good moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love IT!!! Getting ready to repurchase another one so Iu2019ll have a back up !!!

reviews.review_title: Made Me Break Out Like Crazy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this because of all the good reviews I read. I have tried every face cleanser under the earth and have never been satisfied with the results. Unfortunately, I have been using this for over 2 months and am still breaking out worse than ever and nothing is clearing up. Tried using once a day and twice a day, still did not help. Really sad this product didn't work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching high and low for a cleanser that not only cleans thoroughly, but also doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped and dry afterward. I'm happy to say that this not only did that, but more. If I see a few stubborn pimples popping up, I'll wash my face with this and overnight the redness and size of them noticeably goes down. The scent is very pleasant despite containing sulfur. The product is thicker than most cleansers I've used but foams up really well with warm water. Hands down this is my go-to nighttime cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from cystic/hormonal acne. I have been through TONS of cleansers and I even took Accutane for a year. I got a sample of this after looking at the Glam Glow for a second purchase (great stuff by the way) and the Sephora rep recommended this. My sample lasted about 3 nights and I was sold! The price was a turn off, especially not knowing anything about Kate Somerville. I just purchased my first full size and less than a week all the pimples that I could feel surfacing under my skin are gone and the current ones are going away. My skin isn't overly dry, maybe because I use the TARTE maracuja oil right after I wash (with a Clarisonic I might add.....), and I wake up to great glowing skin. It's been years since my face has looked this great and I can even tell a difference applying my makeup. Also, I have super duper oily skin. I look like I've been playing in baby oil after an hour or so IF I DONT WEAR MAKEUP.... This is definitely a staple in my beauty collection. It's pricey, but a little goes A LONG WAAAAY!!!! I just add a pea sized amount in the center of my clarisonic and go. I have the Glam Glow cleanser (the white bottle) in the same size as this, and I've been using it for about 2.5 months if that helps to give an idea of how long it will last, and I'm about 1/3 through the Glam Glow face wash. You wont be sorry for spending the money on this IF this works for your skin. KATE, WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE?!?!!?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant to try this because of the price, but I'm glad I did. A pea sized amount goes a long way. I use this once a day in the AM. I found using it twice a day is too drying on my already dry skin and irritates my sensitive skin a bit too, but once a day is perfect. My adult/cystic acne reacts well to sulfur and I like that this is a gentler option than what I've been prescribed before by my dermatologist. It helps my surface acne to clear a bit and helps prevent newer ones as well. Definitely give this a try if you're hesitant like I was. It might not be a cure all, but it's pretty good and using once a day, a pea sized amount, I've had my bottle for several months.

reviews.review_text: This is the only acne wash that seems to work for me. If you have tried other acne washes and they didn't work I highly recommend trying this wash. It foams up really nice and the amount of product you need is very little. This will last a good while for sure!

reviews.review_text: Helped with my break outs

It truly is a miracle product. I've struggled with my acne (mostly blackheads) since 6th grade. I've tried many, many cleansers, but none seem to work quite like this one. I was told by Kendra from Sephora that this would work so quick that you'd see a difference in your skin within the first use. I was skeptical at first, but after one wash I immediately noticed a difference in my skin. The little bumps on my skin that surfaced after a bad reaction to a cc cream had gone down significantly--- they were still there, but very much less noticeable. I can't wait to see what a months worth of continued usage will bring!

I have been using this face wash for about a week so far it's really drawing out all of the gunk from my pores and my skins finally clearing up! My face looks smoother and brighter!! I've had acne since middle school and have tried pretty much everything with little to no results, this is a game changer. Just don't get it in your eyes and be warned you can smell the sulfur but it's all worth it to have clear beautiful skin! The smell doesn't linger and it doesn't dry out my skin, but I always follow up with a moisturizer.

I got this face wash recently and the first night I used it I woke up with amazingly improved skin. I have fairly moderate acne and just this wash alone made my acne almost completely disappear. The texture and color of it makes it fun to use.. the texture is almost like clay sorta. If your having any doubts about getting this.. just take the plunge and buy it!! :)

Works really great on my combination skin, I previously have had little success with salicylic acid products. Immediatly started to reduce and heal active break outs. After a few weeks of use I noticed a thickening of skin on the chin followed by an intense peeling of dead skin in that area. I now have new fresh skin and only the occasional breakout!

Finally! Kate Somerville has the Eradikate acne face wash! My acne is completely gone after a few uses. It's non-drying, feels good after I wash my face. I use this along with the mask and treatment. It's amazing!!! Wish Sephora had the box set of the Eradikate line! Hands down the best line for acne!

It's keeping my acne at bay and helping diminish older scarring. The sulfer in it does not smell like the Eradikate treatment does so or does not have that strong scent. Lathers and rinses well! I would recommend!
